Hayley (SEVEN DIALS MEDICAL CENTRE - G81047)" <hayley.wood19@nhs.net>, Jessicaotterwell@gmail.com
Dear Trustees,
Please find attached my formal Subject Access Request (SAR) submitted under UK GDPR Article 15 and Data
Protection Act 2018 s.45. The SAR includes Annex A (Schedule of Requested Documents) and Exhibits A and
B.
For clarity:
Exhibit A (“All Communications Logged” Admission, 7 May 2025) is relevant to both regulators. It
demonstrates unlawful processing of special category data (ICO remit) and shows trustees knowingly held
safeguarding disclosures but failed to act (Charity Commission remit).
